formattedAddress: 45 John St, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 45 John St, New York, NY 10038, USA

editorialSummary.text: Light-filled venue with a contemporary feel serving classic brews & brunch standards.

originalText.text:
I just discover brunch perfection Coffee shop in the Financial District.
They have a very impressive food menu from classic favorites to innovative creations.
Its commitment to quality shines through in every dish, crafted with fresh, high quality ingredients.
The super friendly staff and stylish interior make it a standout destination for those seeking a delightful brunch experience.

originalText.text:
Had a really awesome experience here. The food is very good and high quality. Service was kind, the prices were fair for the drinks, food was a bit expensive but you are paying for very high quality food and quick service.

I especially loved the iced caramel latte

text.text:
Had a really awesome experience here. The food is very good and high quality. Service was kind, the prices were fair for the drinks, food was a bit expensive but you are paying for very high quality food and quick service.

I especially loved the iced caramel latte

originalText.text:
I had a very bad experience at Suited Cafe this morning, a staff in the Cafe was very unfriendly. I am a bit nearsighted and I wasn't wearing glasses, so I couldn't see the menu on the wall clearly. I asked this lady if there's a paper menu, and she impatiently replied, "No".

I told her it's a bit difficult to see the menu on the wall, not only did she not provide any help, but she also showed extreme impatience.

No matter what question I asked her, she would deny it and respond loudly with a valley girl accent, basically she was trying to make me feel that my question was very stupid. She even rolled her eyes to show her contempt.

I have lived in New York for more than 10 years and have not written any negative reviews for service staff, because I have not had any unpleasant experiences. I was shocked by the lady's attitude.

I've been living in the area for three years. I used to occasionally visit this restaurant, but haven't come over in the past few months. The restaurant is quite good, both in terms of food and drink quality. I just don't understand why the shop owner would hire such a mean, rude and impolite person?

Due to the impatient attitude of this lady, I rushly ordered breakfast without seeing the menu clearly,as I didn't eat pork and beef, I left without taking a few bites.üòÇ

originalText.text: I ordered a macchiato and a bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich around 1 pm-ish, and both were absolutely phenomenal. I sat outside to eat and they came out to give me my coffee and sandwich, as well as a glass of water. The shop itself was really welcoming, and the outside seating section was very comfortable. Highly recommend!

text.text: I ordered a macchiato and a bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich around 1 pm-ish, and both were absolutely phenomenal. I sat outside to eat and they came out to give me my coffee and sandwich, as well as a glass of water. The shop itself was really welcoming, and the outside seating section was very comfortable. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I like their lemon chicken salad too much. The onion is tasty and flavorful also the pecan is huge and well-roasted. I also order their breakfast platter sometimes, the mayor sauce on the side is a great addition. Overall a cute caffe with good food if you are looking for a short break and quick bite.
